alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Hutchinson; Lipscomb; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 10:57AM CST until February 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to around one to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Hemphill, Hutchinson, Lipscomb, and Roberts Counties. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Icy roads possible after the main precipitation band due to a quick temperature drop, resulting in a flash freeze. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will impact mainly the northern portions of these counties as very sharp drop offs in snow amounts will occur over just a 5 mile distance. Additionally, flash freeze potential could occur for areas to the south that get just rain, since temperatures are expected to drop quickly behind the main precipitation band.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call 800-452-9292 for road information.
